item.title: Open VPN Installation on Centos 6.5
item.description: In a rush , so will jot down the steps only. You’ll need epel repo On CentOS 6 , that will be Once that is done , yum install openvpn easy-rsa mkdir -p /etc/openvpn/easy-rsa/keys cp -rf /usr/share/easy-rsa/2.0/* /etc/openvpn/easy-rsa/ vi /etc/openvpn/easy-rsa/vars Modify these parameters to suit your need cd /etc/openvpn/easy-rsa/ cp openssl-1.0.0.cnf openssl.cnf source ./vars ./clean-all ./build-ca ./build-key-server server ./build-key client ( if you want to use RSA Keys for Connectivity )
